transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Good morning sir.
Customer: Good morning. Kaun bol rahe hain sir?
Executive: Ha, Kaushlesh bol raha hu. Aapne phone kiya tha abhi.
Customer: Kaun bol rahe hain?
Executive: Kaushlesh, Kaushlesh aapke account manager hu.
Customer: Kaulesh hai?
Executive: Kaushlesh, Kaushlesh aapke account manager.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Customer: Achcha Kaushlesh ji aisa hai, main na Lakshmi Polybag se bol raha hu.
Executive: Ha ha ha sir.
Customer: Ek na mere ko na thodi si help chahiye thi. A, ye na, maine na ek employee hire kiye hain specially for IndiaMART.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Customer: To unki na training ki requirement thi.
Executive: Requirement nahi sir, aap aap se baat bhi hui thi aapne bola tha ki Diwali baad karenge humne kaha theek hai sir Diwali nahi.
Customer: Ha ha to isiliye wo abhi tak appointment nahi ki thi to abhi appointment ho chuki hai to fir ye kaise ya to main unka number du aapko kaise kaise karenge?
Customer: Ya unko bol du aapko call kar lenge.
Executive: Sir dekhiye unka call is number pe nahi lagega kyuki ye mera official number hai to ye sirf registered number ke liye hi allow hota hai. Jiska registered number hai na. To unka to dusra number hai aap unka number mujhe de dijiye main unhe whatsapp pe connect karke ek baar google meet ke through unko go through kara dunga.
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: To ya to aap mujhe whatsapp pe hi hello dal dijiye kyuki main sara Kaulesh ke naam se kar raha tha mujhe ye tha aapka naam Kaulesh hai.
Executive: Achcha Kaulesh nahi nahi Kaushlesh. To main main main bas wahi pe google search surch mar mur ke fir maine kaha yaar mere paas number to tha aapka pata nahi kahan gadbad ho gayi. To aap ek baar whatsapp pe hi hello kar dijiye to main unko aapka number de deta hu aap unko thoda sa train kar dijiye.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul sir.
Customer: Theek hai na pura train kar dijiye.
Executive: Ha.
Executive: Maine aapko message kiya bhi tha whatsapp pe iske pehle.
Customer: Kijiye.
Customer: Nahi abhi aapka nahi aaya hua message.
Executive: Sir dekhiye isiliye whatsapp pe gaya main 38003806 8288026380.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: 94 number se gaya hoga 9451592044.
Customer: Ek second ek second.
Customer: Nine.
Executive: 94515.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: 92044.
Customer: Aa gaya. Kaushlesh hai aisa main query kar leta hu.
Executive: Achcha to abhi wo kaise office mein hi baith ke work karenge ya fir wo.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji haan ji.
Customer: Haan ji full time.
Customer: Aapko kiya to tha yaar aap bhul gaye ho kya? Pehle ye batao wo yaad hai na wo mera ye tha na ki maine aapko bola tha ki main ispe complete time nahi de paunga to I will hire somebody to wo aapko full time iske upar aa jayega fir theek hai na to iske liye matlab maine hire kar liya hai to wo aapko pura ka pura wo kar denge.
Executive: Achcha.
Executive: To unka kuch experience experience wagera hai ya fir ekdam ekdam.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi fresher.
Executive: Matlab mujhe basic start karna padega pura.
Customer: Ha ha ha. Waise to chalo aisa koi issue nahi hai graduate hai to easily pata lag jayega aapka.
Executive: Ha matlab wahi hai ki basic ek baar bata denge to ek baar do baar teen baar.
Customer: Ha ha ek baar aap ek ek dedh ghanta aap laga dijiye starting mein to fir kya hai na yaar sahi batau Kaushlesh aap bhi jante ho main discussion puri nahi kar pata hu na party se na kuch aur se uska koi matlab nahi hum bade bade target le le badi badi investment kar de.
Executive: Ha ha.
Customer: Uska best tarika yahi hai simple si baat hai wo jaise aapne aaj man lo do char din training de di to inko easily understand ho jayega apne paas din abhi hai 10 din month end tak fir hum apna package renew karwa denge. Usme kya hai ek din le jayenge isko.
Executive: Le jayenge isko.
Customer: Le jayenge month end tak apne paas time hai dikkat kya hai?
Executive: Abhi to kya hai apna already sir grace mein aapne last time 28 ko pay kiya tha thoda sa.
Customer: Chalo 28 ko yaar yahi yahi problem pata hai mere sath mere ko kya hai sabse badi IndiaMART se ye na matlab aise piche pad jate hain ki pata nahi yaar kya humne koi wo ab aap ab aap seedhi si baat hai main aage se phone kar raha hu na. Matlab maine main aage se kyu phone kar raha hu kuch mujhe samajh aaya kuch maine wo kiya kuch process kiya to ab ye ek problem kya ho jati hai na aapke yahan se ki danda de dete hain ki nahi ji hum to matlab aise nahi abhi karna padega aapko usme banda kehta hai yaar na kar. Kyunki jitni leads aapke yahan se aayegi utni facebook se aayegi utni isse aayegi aur bhi options hai isliye banda na man mar deta hai matlab seedhi si baat hai yaar jo mentally jis bande ko satisfaction hoegi paise wali game hai koi aise nahi panch char hajar ki game hai chal theek hai palat diya. To try to understand as a customer point of view aisa nahi hai number change kariye main ha main unko bol deta hu ab wo number de rahe hain theek hai she is Harpreet Harpreet Kaur.
Executive: Harpreet Kaur theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai abhi aapke paas call aa jayegi.
Executive: Theek hai okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs training for new employee.

- Expresses frustration with IndiaMART's follow-up approach.



Resolution:

- Executive will provide training via WhatsApp and Google Meet.

- Customer will share employee's WhatsApp number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to connect with employee for training.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- training, whatsapp, employee, follow-up, leads
